Voiceover | Dubbing | Casting | Music Composition | Sound Design | SAG Signatory | Founded by Ren√© Veilleux and Donald Roman Lopez, we are an independent production company based in Los Angeles, CA. The company thrives on being multifaceted and quick at adapting in the ever- so evolving entertainment industry. 

We surround ourselves with extremely skilled and talented collaborators both on our work-for-hire divisions and on our own properties.

Today is #AfricaVoiceOverDay! üó£Ô∏èüåçü´°‚úäüèΩ That‚Äôs right! We now have a whole day (May 5th) dedicated to us #AfricanVoiceArtists It‚Äôs a special day that not only marks the uniqueness and beauty of our collective art and voices but a wonderful day to celebrate the art of storytelling. Because of our special gift of the human voice, Africa's diverse and timeless stories continue to inspire the world through audio / audiovisual storytelling and communication. We take great pride in doing what we do with a burning desire to create content that will continue to inspire, entertain, educate, inform and motivate people through an array of different emotions in different #voiceover niche areas whether it‚Äôs narration, advertising, film, animation or interactive content. Today, we come together to celebrate our passion and diversity. This initiative has been launched amongst others, to celebrate Africa's rich cultural diversity by showcasing the varied languages, dialects, and narratives that enrich our continent. God Bless all African Voice Artists! And God bless Africa! #AVD #AVD2024 #AfricaToTheWorld #AfricaVoiceoverDay2024 #Vocalexpressionists #VOPassion #VOLife

Yesterday was the last day of the Festival Internacional De Cine De Cartagena De Indias- FICCI, a 63-year old vibrant event, in one of the most beautiful cities in the world. In addition to the festival offering an eclectic collection of cinema from around the world, FICCI offers several networking opportunities to explore potential coproductions with LATAM players. Verit√© Entertainment and its subsidiary company Verit√© Colombia attended with our Colombian team connecting with potential partners for our live action slate. It was a phenomenal event. Thank you PROCOLOMBIA for facilitating the matchmaking for la "rueda de negocios"

Annecy Jury Award-winning FOUR SOULS OF COYOTE is the Official Hungarian Entry for the Academy Awards¬©. At the meeting of the Hungarian Oscar Selection Committee, it was announced that Hungary will enter FOUR SOULS OF COYOTE to be considered for nomination in the ‚ÄúAcademy Awards - Best International Film‚Äù category. Directed by accomplished director √Åron Gauder, produced by R√©ka Temple‚Äôs Cinemon Ent. FOUR SOULS OF COYOTE is retelling the Native American creation myths while also reflecting on our present. FOUR SOULS OF COYOTE premiered at Annecy festival main competition this summer, where it was given the Jury Award, and went on to win further accolades including Shanghai fest‚Äôs Best Animated Film, since then the film received numerous awards and has been invited to more than 30 festivals.
